criteria.description: Validator checks every ingredient is present once, quantities scale proportionally to target servings, and units remain consistent.
criteria.justification: Checks missing/extra ingredients and proportional quantities via avg relative error, but does not validate units or detect duplicate ingredients.

criteria.description: Reward function differentiates exact match (+1), near match within 5% (+0.5), and penalties for missing/excess ingredients or formatting errors (-1).
criteria.justification: Implements exact (1.0), near (<5% -> 0.5), and penalties (-1) for invalid JSON or missing/extra ingredients.

criteria.description: Examples seeded in the environment are a variety of different scaling tasks (upscale, downscale, fractional-serving, etc)
criteria.justification: Only one base recipe present and no seeded example set demonstrating varied target servings.

criteria.description: More than 10 examples are seeded in the environment.
criteria.justification: No seeded examples list; environment has a single recipe.

criteria.description: Reward function is smooth, where even if we're not exactly correct, we still have some reward for being partially correct.
criteria.justification: Provides partial credit at <5% error (0.5), but jumps to -1 beyond that; not fully smooth.

notes: Validator lacks unit checks and duplicate detection. Reward tiers match rubric thresholds but are coarse. Environment does not include a diverse or large set of seeded examples; only a single 'pancakes' recipe is defined and scenarios rely on external config.
